definition: one of the paired hinged shells of certain molluscs and of brachiopods
details:
noun
- one of the paired hinged shells of certain molluscs and of brachiopods
- the entire one-piece shell of a snail and certain other molluscs
- a control consisting of a mechanical device for controlling the flow of a fluid
= example: a control consisting of a mechanical device for controlling the flow of a fluid
- a device in a brass wind instrument for varying the length of the air column to alter the pitch of a tone
- a structure in a hollow organ, like the heart, with a flap to insure one-way flow of fluid through it
= example: a structure in a hollow organ, like the heart, with a flap to insure one-way flow of fluid through it
